name: Wack Your Keyboard
description:
Do you have a disposable keyboard, that you wouldn't mind breaking to experience this amazing game and gain a small adrenaline rush while playing? 

Then this is the correct game for you. In this project I experimented with using a standart keyboard in a bit of a different way to play games. If you read the title you might get where the idea came from ("Wack a mole"), but tranfered to old crappy keyboard that you don't mind destroying.

The way you play this is quite simple, when you start the game, a your screen will show you which buttons to smash, you get poitns by smashing these keys. There is also a special event, which I will let you find for yourself how it works, but it is pretty self explanatory... YOU...SMASH...
